summary.span: 当在派生类中实现并使用指定的执行上下文、回调方法和用户状态时，将异步活动排入运行时工作流队列中。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class and using the specified execution context, callback method, and user state, enqueues an asynchronous activity in a run-time workflow.
An object.

summary.span: 用作虚拟方法并将通过缓存反射获取的信息转换为异步活动的参数。

span.span: Serves as a virtual method and converts information obtained by cache reflection into arguments for an asynchronous activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自定义活动作者可以在活动的 重写中提供验证逻辑。Custom activity authors can provide validation logic in an activity's override. 由 引发的任何异常不会视为验证错误。Any exceptions that are thrown from are not treated as validation errors. 这些异常将从对 的调用中转义，并且必须由调用方进行处理。These exceptions will escape from the call to and must be handled by the caller.

span.span: Serves as a virtual method and converts information obtained by reflection on a cache into arguments for an asynchronous activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自定义活动作者可以在活动的 重写中提供验证逻辑。Custom activity authors can provide validation logic in an activity's override. 由 引发的任何异常不会视为验证错误。Any exceptions that are thrown from are not treated as validation errors. 这些异常将从对 的调用中转义，并且必须由调用方进行处理。These exceptions will escape from the call to and must be handled by the caller.
